mapper.select: select op.order_date, op.order_key, pr.product_mainimagepath, pr.product_name, od.product_cnt, od.product_id, od.product_kind_price, od.delivery_status from order_detail od inner join order_product op on od.order_key = op.order_key inner join product pr on od.product_id = pr.product_id where op.user_id = #{user_id};
mapper.insert: insert into order_detail (order_key, product_id, product_cnt, product_kind_price) values((select * from (select IFNULL(Max(order_key), 0)+1 from order_product) as temp), #{product_id}, #{product_cnt}, #{product_kind_price});
mapper.update: update order_detail set order_key=#{order_key}, delivery_status=#{delivery_status} where order_key=#{order_key}
